title: The Empath
description: Every werewolf needs a mate…Nicolas was the strongest and fiercest of the Draicon, until he was banished. Now the werewolf has only one path to find the Draicon’s long-lost empath, the woman who will save the pack – and Nicolas himself – from terrible danger. Maggie is a vet, dedicated to healing.She has no idea of her true nature, the magic waiting in her soul – or the man coming to claim her. The survival of their pack depends on them finding each other, on their ability to become one. But their enemies have also found Maggie and will kill to stop her surrendering to an all-consuming passion…
author: Bonnie Vanak
